Reviews.Title: Better image than some other cables
Reviews.Author: S. Howe
Reviews.Content: When I ordered my Zmodo home security system I also bought these cables, I did a side by side comparison of three cameras using three cables (the original zmodo cable, this white cable, and another black I purched from amazon)all cameras were pointed at  the same area and the daytime images compared side by side on the monitor. The 2 black cables appeared identical, the white cable produced better color and better clarity than the other 2. During installation, this white cable and one of the black cables got damaged, I skinned them back and made repairs, the black cable had no shielding just three 24-26 gauge wires, the common was shared between the video signal and the power supply to the camera. The white cable was shielded and I had no reason to break the junction so I do not know if it shared the common, but I suspect it did.  Nightime peformance was not tested side by side, but the camera LED's rely on proper voltage to work correctly, I suspect the small guage wire limits the LED performance and the distance I see on camera at night. If I had to do again, I would invest in better cables with separate power and shielded video cables.

Reviews.Title: Good cord
Reviews.Author: reeverdawg
Reviews.Content: I ordered this cord and it worked for the first 10 minutes.  When I contacted the company to inform them of the faulty cable, They were very prompt in getting back to me.  No questions asked, the fast and courteous customer service impressed me so much that I would recommend this seller to anyone who is looking for products they have in their catalog.

Reviews.Title: Fine Product
Reviews.Author: JS "locoman"
Reviews.Content: Fine Product all 60ft of it cam feed cable to qsee standards.for all camera with bnc and power cable together.

Reviews.Title: BNC RCA Cable
Reviews.Author: Dirty Harry
Reviews.Content: They don't tell you that you need BNC Double female connectors to connect this cable to another.  I had to go to Radio Shack and buy them.
